overview: The founding CEO of Playdom, Dan Yue now serves as the companyâ€™s Chief Product Officer. In the same ilk as many of the Valleyâ€™s leading entrepreneurs, Dan is an interesting character. With a degree in physics from Swarthmore College, Dan uses data-driven insights to understand what players want and deliver it. A lifelong gamer, Dan has played thousands of hours of Final Fantasy 7 and Baldurâ€™s Gate 2, and spent 34 long days as a semi-professional Blackjack player. Danâ€™s commitment to the player experience runs so deep that he wakes up several times a night to check the performance of our games.
